# GuruFocus-Py
Python Scripts/Modules to Interact with Gurufocus API

## API Overview
[GuruFocus API Landing Page](https://www.gurufocus.com/api/overview)

## Installation
You can install gurupy from [PyPi](https://pypi.org/project/gurupy/)

~~~
python -m pip install gurupy
~~~

## Usage 

Used to leverage GuruFocus API for stock analysis via jupyter notebooks
